text: 19:29 Aposel 20:4; 27:2; Rom 16:23; 1 Korin 1:14; Kolosi 4:10; Filemon 1:24Ezɨ mong gɨn nguibar kamɨn itir gumazamiziba bar nɨgɨnir dafam gami. Egha me bar, Gaius ko Aristarkusɨn suiragha aning a mɨkɨrɨgha, voroghɨra uari akuvir danganir ekiamɨn zuamɨra ivemara ghue. Aning, Masedonian gumazir Pol koma aruimning.
